fragment.subhead: Nursery lessons in words of one syllable
fragment.p: See! Here is a fine nag. And that is a good boy who rides on it too; for he reads his book so well, and is so neat and clean, that his kind aunt gave him this nice horse; and I am sure James takes good care of her gift.
